mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EVENT(eventNum, num, subject, content, startDate, endDate) VALUES (#{eventNum}, #{num}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
INSERT INTO EVENTPIC(eventPicNum, imageFileName, eventNum) VALUES (eventPic_seq.NEXTVAL, #{imageFileName}, #{eventNum})
mapper.select:
SELECT e.eventNum, e.num, e.subject, e.content, e.hitCount, ep.imageFileName FROM event e JOIN eventPic ep ON e.eventNum = ep.eventNum
AND INSTR(ep.imageFileName, 'main') > 0
ORDER BY e.eventNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY

SELECT e.eventNum, e.num, e.subject, e.content, e.hitCount, TO_CHAR(e.created, 'yyyy.mm.dd') created, e.startDate, e.endDate, ep.imageFileName FROM event e JOIN eventPic ep ON e.eventNum = ep.eventNum WHERE e.eventNum=#{eventNum} AND INSTR(ep.imageFileName, 'main') = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE event e SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE eventNum = #{eventNum}
mapper.select:
SELECT eventNum, subject FROM event e
AND (eventNum > #{eventNum})
ORDER BY eventNum ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT eventNum, subject FROM event e
AND (eventNum < #{eventNum})
ORDER BY eventNum DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE event SET subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, imageFileName=#{imageFileName}, startDate=#{startDate}, endDate=#{endDate} WHERE eventNum=#{eventNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO eventReply(eventReplyNum, eventNum, num, content, answer) VALUES (eventReply_seq.NEXTVAL, #{eventNum}, #{num}, #{content}, #{answer})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM eventReply WHERE eventNum=#{eventNum} AND answer=0

SELECT er.eventReplyNum, er.eventNum, m.userId, er.content, er.created, NVL(answerCount, 0) answerCount FROM eventReply er JOIN memberDetail m ON er.num = m.num LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT answer, COUNT(*) answerCount FROM eventReply WHERE answer !=0 GROUP BY answer ) a ON er.replyNum = a.answer WHERE eventNum=#{eventNum} AND er.answer=0 ORDER BY er.replyNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
